text:
@realDonaldTrump 10 days ago you said coronavirus was an hoax and the 15 people affected would have quickly become zero. 
How can you be so stupid? A 5th grader is smarter than you. When we will have thousands of deaths reported the whole world, who tou keep insulting, will laugh at you
